00034 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00035 #include "kvi_inttypes.h"
00036 
00037 // KVILIB_API has been removed from these two functions
00038 // these should always go inlined
00039 
00040 inline kvi_u64_t kvi_swap64(kvi_u64_t i)
00041 {
00042         // abcdefgh to hgfedcba
00043         return ((i << 56) |                /* h to a */
00044                 ((i & 0xff00) << 40) |     /* g to b */
00045                 ((i & 0xff0000) << 24) |   /* f to c */
00046                 ((i & 0xff000000) << 8) |  /* e to d */
00047                 ((i >> 8) & 0xff000000) |  /* d to e */
00048                 ((i >> 24) & 0xff0000) |   /* c to f */
00049                 ((i >> 40) & 0xff00) |     /* b to g */
00050                 (i >> 56));                /* a to h */
00051 }
00052 
00053 inline kvi_u32_t kvi_swap32(kvi_u32_t i)
00054 {
00055         // abcd to dcba
00056         return ((i << 24) | ((i & 0xff00) << 8) | ((i >> 8) & 0xff00) | (i >> 24));
00057 }
00058 
00059 inline kvi_u16_t kvi_swap16(kvi_u16_t i)
00060 {
00061         // ab to ba
00062         return ((i << 8) | (i >> 8));
00063 }
00064 
00065 #endif // !_KVI_BSWAP_H_
